Events that occurred on 14 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1950 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 130.
1957 - The Bookseller reports from the International Fantasy Award, won by Tolkien.
1974 - The first Oxonmoot is held at The Welsh Pony, Oxford.
2002 - Oxonmoot 2002 at St Antony's College.
2007 - Oxonmoot 2007 at Lady Margaret Hall.
2010 - The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest is released in North America.
2014 - Oxonmoot 2014 at Lady Margaret Hall.
2019 - Oxonmoot 2019 at St Antony's College.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
